rooms.description: Modern kitchen with island counters and ample storage
Open-concept living area with natural light, large windows and sliding glass doors to the garden
Adjacent to the living room, with seating arrangement and access to garden view
Spacious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet, positioned in a quiet zone
Cozy bedroom with ample natural light
Additional bedroom designed for comfort and privacy
Dual-purpose study/library with integrated shelves and comfortable seating area
Compact dressing room adjacent to the master bedroom

openings.description: Main entrance door facing east with an inviting porch
Large windows in the living area facing garden to maximize natural light and ventilation
Two-car garage door integrated on the corner plot side
